rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0001
rows.name:
Disaster is raining upon Alst from
the skies...

rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0002
rows.name:
Fortunately, Luxuria has been spared
from the assault, but what is Metsu
thinking? Is he trying to destroy us all?

rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0003
rows.name:
We have not the power to ward off, let
alone stop, the Devices from wreaking
chaos.

rows.label: tlk001201_08_msg0004
rows.name:
You are the only ones who can end this.
The future of Alst lies with you...
